main event: A bright light followed by an orange streak was observed in the sky over Dhahran, Saudi Arabia on September 26, 1960.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for only 5 seconds.,The observer noted the object was distinctly different from any meteor he had seen.,The object was moving at a high elevation angle of 70 to 80 degrees.,There was a bright light followed by a flame streak estimated to cover an angle distance of 10 degrees.,The direction of movement indicated by the streak was from southeast to northeast.
sighted object: very bright light followed by an orange streak of flame
witness description: observer from the weather squadron at Dhahran AFLD
